requirements.summary: Rename the app from 'Devel' to 'Devil India' consistently across all user-facing text, page titles, meta tags, and branding elements
acceptanceCriteria: The HTML <title> in index.html reads 'Devil India'
The navigation bar logo/wordmark displays 'Devil India'
The landing page hero section displays 'Devil India' as the app name
The ProfileSetupModal references 'Devil India' instead of 'Devel'
No instance of 'Devel', 'Insta Clone', or 'Instagram Clone' remains in any user-facing text

file_operations.description: Update the <title> tag from 'Devel' to 'Devil India' to change the browser tab title and meta tags
Replace all instances of 'Devel' with 'Devil India' in the hero section heading, subheading, feature descriptions, and footer text to update the landing page branding
Update the navigation bar logo/wordmark from 'Devel' to 'Devil India' to reflect the new app name in the top navigation
Replace any references to 'Devel' with 'Devil India' in the modal title, description, or placeholder text to ensure consistency during first-time user onboarding
